thread.title: Thought Hillary’s Email Scandal Was Over? Look Who May Now Be Hit with Criminal Charges…
thread.title_full: Thought Hillary’s Email Scandal Was Over? Look Who May Now Be Hit with Criminal Charges…

author: EdJenner
title: Thought Hillary’s Email Scandal Was Over? Look Who May Now Be Hit with Criminal Charges…
text:
Go to Article 
The saga of the Clinton server is not quite over. The House Oversight Committee is now contemplating charges against Clinton aide Bryan Pagliano for failing to respond to Congressional subpoenas. From Free Beacon: A former State Department IT technician who set up Hillary Clinton’s private email server in her home may face criminal charges for […] Comment on this Article Via Your Facebook Account Comment on this Article Via Your Disqus Account Follow Us on Facebook!
